professionalSummary.summary: A curious and passionate computer science student, possessing high energy and enthusiasm, with proficiency in leadership and a solid grounding in mathematics, science, and programming logic. A fast learner, always eager to enhance skills and broaden horizons.

responsibilities: Applied advanced problem-solving skills to co-design and develop full-stack web applications using .NET and ReactJS, addressing complex challenges effectively.
Participated in workshops and training sessions, gaining hands-on experience in DevOps, API design, and agile project management methodologies.
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to co-design and develop technology solutions addressing social, economic, and environmental challenges.

projects.name: LiteLane
description: A car game implemented in C Programming language.

projects.name: FlavorFusion
description: Utilized HTML and CSS to create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Watch Haven
description: E-commerce website designed for a watch collection.
Designed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL.
Includes add-to-cart, wishlist, checkout page, and eSewa payment integration.

certificates: IT Essentials of Cisco Networking Academy
